text: Waseda Law School (）is the law school of Waseda University. It is among the top seven law schools that constituted the Leading Law School (, LL7) along with the law schools of University of Tokyo, Kyoto University, Hitotsubashi University, Keio University, Chuo University, and Kobe University.「LL7とは」先導的法科大学院懇談会「2019 KEIO UNIVERSITY LAW SCHOO」L - 慶應義塾大学 法科大学院 The building that housed Waseda Law School == Basics == * Established in 2004 * Dean: MATSUMURA, Kazunori (松村和徳) * Degree conferred: Juris Doctor * Semester starts every April * Duration of the study: 3 years; 2 years for the accelerated program早稲田大学 大学院法務研究科 公式サイト内、カリキュラム 2017年6月12日閲覧 == References == Category:Waseda University Category:Law schools in Japan ==External Link==
title: Waseda Law School
